messages.subject: Scholastic Warehouse sale
messages.msgSnippet: For any of you near the Denver area, there is a Scholastic Warehouse sale going on until May 21st.  The prices are unbelievable!  I was there today with my 12
messages.messageBody:
For any of you near the Denver area, there is a Scholastic Warehouse
sale going on until May 21st. The prices are unbelievable! I was
there today with my 12 yo son and 14 yo daughter and got some
terrific bargains. Aisles and aisles to choose from - a good
selection - some workbooks, adult fiction, children's classics, fun
stuff (experiments, etc - my son got a kit to build a small solar
powered car) -

Location: 14309 East 35th Place, Aurora, CO
(this is north of Colfax just off of Sable)
Hours: 9:00 am - 7:00 pm Mon - Fri 9:00 am - 5:00 pm Sat

There's a large $1.00 book area with a good selection - There's
a "deep discounts" area on books already marked down and then 50% off
of that -

I picked up the hard copy of the latest Harry Potter book (#4, I
believe) for $10.00 !!

We spent 2 1/2 hours in there... great bargains, great prices :)

Pam
